long_description: The PitchFork Bike Mount from Rocky Mounts is a great value in a sturdy, aerodynamic rooftop bike mount-and comes in a wide choice of colors so you can match it to your car or bike. 45 in. long tray accommodates long wheelbases found on 29ers and full-suspension bikes; works with the skinniest of road tires and mountain bike tires up to 2.7 in. wide. Long-throw, quick-release design with 12mm of closure is lockable and easy to use; back tire attachs with easy-to-use nylon ratchet strap. Durable stainless-steel, low-profile head and full-length tubular aluminum wheel tray provide years of hassle-free use. Fits bikes with or without disc brakes. Fits on Thule square bars and Yakima round bars without a special fit kit. The Rocky Mounts PitchFork Bike Mount is lockable with Rocky Mounts lock cores (sold separately). Please note: Rocky Mounts PitchFork is not compatible with Thule Aero bars.
short_description: The PitchFork Bike Mount from Rocky Mounts is a great value in a sturdy, aerodynamic rooftop bike mount-and comes in a wide choice of colors so you can match it to your car or bike.
